content: Does lean know about the category A-mod (representations of an algebra A)? If not, does anyone know of any other documentation for how categories are defined in Lean? I'm having a little trouble following the documentation in Mathlib4 for other categories which are there.
Do you know how I would equip it with the information that the modules have to be reps of A?
@Ali Ramsey, that is baked into the definition of ModuleCat A.
Ah yeah, I just realised why that is (I'm very new to representation theory). Thank you!
Ali Ramsey has marked this topic as resolved.
